title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: Hello Forum Admin. Can you create a new Board called " Bitcoin Business and Networking". This Board will be very helpful for Bitcoin  traders and those who seeking to do networking will find it helpful in the forum. Thanks for your consideration. Digital Monk

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Admin will not just create a board, there should be many threads on other boards that is pertaining the board that you are requesting for, put the links to the threads on this thread. Even with that, I do not think admin want to create more boards for now. I do not know much about bitcoin networking if what you are saying is correct, but anything related to trading can be on trading discussion board.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: New boards are created when certain boards have many topics that would better fit the new board. Without that, requests for new boards are mostly ignored.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: In fact, you already have such a board here, it's called Trading Discussion. Is there any reason you believe it is not sufficient for the topics you desire to discuss?

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: If you want to network with people, there are better avenues for that such as Twitter. Not really sure how great the "networking" would be knowing that 99% of us here are pseudonymous.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:39:45 AMThis Board will be very helpful for Bitcoin  traders and those who seeking to do networking will find it helpful in the forum.Well if you want a board where bitcoin traders can 'network' with one another, i'd take 'network' here to mean sharing trading signals and strategies to assist in your trade, then you can just do that in the trading discussion section, prolly create a thread with your own signal and strategies, and request other traders that are willing to share theirs to join in the party. But if by 'networking' you mean meeting new people that are involved in trading like yourself, then i'm afraid Bitcointalk isn't the right place for that cause of privacy reasons.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:39:45 AMHello Forum Admin. Can you create a new Board called " Bitcoin Business and Networking". This Board will be very helpful for Bitcoin  traders and those who seeking to do networking will find it helpful in the forum. Thanks for your consideration. Digital MonkI don't understand what you meant by Bitcoin business and networking. Do you mean a board that will be like an exchange where you buy and sell Bitcoin? There is service board where many people offer such services.  Do you mean where to find help about trading, there is trading board. Are you saying about altcoins help there is also a board. What do you mean by Bitcoin business, there is goods board. I think every board that is relating to Bitcoin is complete in this forum.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:39:45 AMBitcoin  traders For bitcoin traders, there is the Trading Discussion  Board, I don't think there's any need for another. Quote and those who seeking to do networking will find it helpfulFor networking, there is the ~Marketplace.And inside Marketplace, there are child boards like ~GoodsServicesCurrency ExchangeLendingAuctionService Announcement and Discussion. All this boards are for bitcoin related businesses, and networking of any kind, I see no need for another.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 31, 2022, 07:39:45 AMHello Forum Admin. Can you create a new Board called " Bitcoin Business and Networking". What is the board economics doing where you could find other child boards where relevant tooics in this aspect could fit in, i don't think there's a need for that since the forum is blessed with enough board that covers every aspect you could thought of including your locale, i will just advise you to sit down and search through the boards one after the other and discover where such could fit in for discussion, except you have another motive behind this to be done that is not projected to us but which could have be against the forum acceptability and conduct.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: I'll give credit to OP for being a newbie who's very passionate and inquisitive about bitcoin (I'm trying to just take his posts and rank at face value and not assume he's an alt account).  Based on his post history, this looks to be a genuine request to improve the forum and not some ignorant noob, although it would have been much better had he indeed noticed the Trading Discussion section, among others, which will probably suit him just fine.My guess is that you're gone from this thread for good OP, but in case you do check back in, there's pretty much zero chance Theymos takes your suggestion.  It's nothing personal; lots of great proposals for improvement have been submitted and died a slow and quiet death.  Take this forum as it is, and hope that someday it might be close to how you'd like it.
